user.title: Tautulli
user.description:
To find your API key, open the Tautulli web interface and navigate to Settings and then to Web interface. The API key will be at the bottom of that page.

Example of the URL: http://192.168.0.10:8181 with 8181 being the default port.

reauth_confirm.title: Tautulli
reauth_confirm.description: To find your API key, open the Tautulli web interface and navigate to Settings and then to Web interface. The API key will be at the bottom of that page.
